title: Ep 92 | Jase vs. a Coyote, Al vs. Paint Samples, and Phil vs. the Misguided Pursuit of Miracles
description:
Jase went up against a coyote, and it didn't end well for the coyote. Al offers some slick advice on how to get out of making home decorating decisions. And Phil, Jase, and Al discuss seeing the supernatural in your life, why Jesus is better than miracles, people who hate Jesus, and churchgoers who are only there for the blessings.

https://KEEPS.com/DOOR 

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX
 
See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1
